languages.text: "Хвала Императору, Лорд-капитан! Я буду ждать вас в кают-компании".
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!

languages.text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!
languages.original_text: "Хвала Императору, Лорд-капитан! Я буду ждать вас в кают-компании".

traits.locale_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
"Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
"Praise the Emperor, Lord Cap'n. When you deign to turn your invaluable attention to this matter, come to me and I will escort you to the wardroom."
"Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
"Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
"Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."
"Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, Lord Captain! Ich werde in der Offiziersmesse auf Euch warten."
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei der Imperator, Lord Captain! Ich werde in der Offiziersmesse auf Euch warten."

languages.text: « Loué soit l'Empereur, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vous attendrai dans le carré des officiers. »
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'Empereur, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Je vous attendrai dans le carré des officiers. »

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下に栄光あれ、ロード・キャプテン！士官室でお待ちしております」
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下に栄光あれ、ロード・キャプテン！士官室でお待ちしております」

languages.text: «¡Loado sea el Emperador, Lord Capitán! Le esperaré en la sala de oficiales».
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: «¡Loado sea el Emperador, Lord Capitán! Le esperaré en la sala de oficiales».

languages.text: “赞美帝皇，舰长大人！我会在军官室等您。”
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: “赞美帝皇，舰长大人！我会在军官室等您。”

languages.text: "İmparator yardımcımız olsun Lord Kaptan! Subay salonunda sizi bekliyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Praise be to the Emperor, Lord Captain! I will be waiting for you in the wardroom."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator yardımcımız olsun Lord Kaptan! Subay salonunda sizi bekliyor olacağım."
